data.enText: the root of the ginger plant used in cooking as a spice

data.chText: 使有活力；使活跃；使兴奋
data.enText: to make sth/sb more active or exciting

data.chText: 使有活力；使活跃；使兴奋
data.enText: to make sth/sb more active or exciting

example: this tonic is guaranteed to give you more pep

tr: pungent rhizome of the common ginger plant
used fresh as a seasoning especially in Asian cookery
perennial plants having thick branching aromatic rhizomes and leafy reedlike stems
add ginger to in order to add flavor
(used especially of hair or fur) having a bright orange-brown color
example: a man with gingery hair and bright blue eyes

value.def: Ginger is the root of a plant that is used to flavour food. It has a sweet spicy flavour and is often sold in powdered form.
Ginger is used to describe things that are orangey-brown in colour.

example.ex: She was a mature lady with dyed ginger hair.
example.tran: 她是一位头发染成姜黄色的成熟女性。

trans: (政党或组织中的)活跃分子集团，骨干小组
姜根(常用于中餐和印度餐)
